repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.unittitle: An Interview with Archie Green "Folklore of the American Labor Movement" Audio-Visual Materials
did.abstract: Audio reel of an interview with Archie Green where he talks about the legends and myths of the labor movement, including songs of the American Labor Movement

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183 kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Archie Green talks about the legends and myths of the labor movement, including songs of the American Labor Movement

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: An Interview with Archie Green "Folklore of the American Labor Movement" Audio-Visual Materials #5641 AV. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: He talks about the legends and myths of the labor movement, including songs of the American Labor Movement
